item.title: Sync Okta identities from an HR system
item.description: Sync Okta identities from an HR system with Anything-as-a-Source Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Build an Anything-as-a-Source custom client integration: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/anything-as-a-source/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. How-tos tend to walk the reader step by step through administrative tasks but not exclusively.
